patterns: What are your hours?
Can I know your opening hours?
What’s your closing time?
When are you open?
When do you close?
What time do you open?
What time do you close?
Can you tell me the library hours?
What's your opening time?
Are you open now?
Is the library open now?
Are you open on weekends?
How long can i stay to read here?
responses: The library is open from 9 AM to 7 PM on weekdays and 10 AM to 5 PM on weekends.
Our hours are 9 AM to 7 PM, Monday through Friday, and 10 AM to 5 PM on weekends.
We are open from 9 AM to 7 PM on weekdays, and 10 AM to 5 PM on weekends.

patterns: When is my book due?
How long can i lend a book?
When do I have to return my book?
How long can I borrow books?
How long can i lend a book?
How long can i keep a book?
When is the book overdue?
When the book becomes due?
What’s the return deadline for books?
What’s the due date for returning books?
responses: Books are due 14 days after check-out. You can renew if needed.
You need to return your book within 2 weeks. Do you need help with renewing it?
The return period is 14 days. You can renew your books online.

patterns: Can I renew my book?
How do I renew a book?
I need to extend my borrowing time
Can I extend the due date?
How do I extend my book loan?
Can i get the same book again?
responses: Yes, you can renew your book online or by visiting the library desk.
You can renew your book online through our library portal or in person.
To renew your book, log in to your library account or visit the front desk.

patterns: How do I become a member?
Can I sign up for a library card?
What are the membership fees?
How can i get the membership?
Tell me details about becoming a member?
Give me membership details!
How can I register for a library card?
What’s the process for getting a library card?
responses: You can sign up for a library card by visiting our front desk or filling out an online form.
Library membership is free. Just bring a valid ID and proof of address to register.
To become a member, fill out the registration form online or at the library.

patterns: What happens if I return a book late?
Do you charge for overdue books?
What are the overdue fees?
How much is the late fee for books?
Is there a penalty for late book returns?
What if i do not return a book?
what if i do not return book on time?
What is the fine for returning books late?
What are the charges for giving back books late?
responses: Yes, we charge $0.25 per day for overdue books.
The overdue fee is $0.25 per day. Please try to return your books on time.
For overdue books, we charge $0.25 per day. You can avoid this by renewing the book.

patterns: Where is the fiction section?
How do I find the research area?
Where can I find non-fiction books?
Where is the children's section?
Can you direct me to the study rooms?
Where is the restroom?
Where can i find the toilet?
Where is the washroom?
Is there a eating area?
responses: Please refer to the library map for detailed directions. Here is the link: [Library Map](http://example.com/library-map).
For guidance on finding different sections, please check the map provided here: [Library Map](http://example.com/library-map).
You can find the directions on our library map. Access it here: [Library Map](http://example.com/library-map).
For detailed directions to various sections, please use the following map: [Library Map](http://example.com/library-map).

patterns: What events are happening at the library?
Are there any upcoming library events?
Can you tell me about library programs?
What workshops or events are scheduled?
Do you have any events this month?
responses: Check our events calendar here: [Library Events](http://example.com/library-events) for the latest updates.
We have various events and programs. Visit our events page for more details: [Library Events](http://example.com/library-events).
Upcoming events can be found on our website. Here's the link to the events calendar: [Library Events](http://example.com/library-events).

patterns: How can I contact the library?
What’s the phone number for the library?
Can I get the library's email address?
What is the best way to reach you?
Do you have a contact number?
Can you give me your number?
responses: You can contact the library at (123) 456-7890 or email us at contact@library.com.
For inquiries, call us at (123) 456-7890 or send an email to contact@library.com.
Reach out to us at (123) 456-7890 or email contact@library.com for any questions.

patterns: Can I use a computer at the library?
Do you have computers available for public use?
Are there computers I can use?
Is there access to computers in the library?
How can I use a library computer?
responses: Yes, we have computers available for public use. You can find them in the Computer Lab area.
Computers are available in the library. Please check the Computer Lab for access.
We provide computer access in the library. Visit the Computer Lab area to use one.

patterns: Do you offer printing services?
Can I print documents at the library?
Are there printers available in the library?
How do I use the library’s printing services?
Is printing available for library members?
responses: Yes, we offer printing services. You can use the printers in the Computer Lab.
Printing is available in the library. Please visit the Computer Lab for details.
You can print documents at the library. Check out the Computer Lab for printing services.

patterns: How much does printing cost?
What are the prices for printing?
Can you tell me the printing fees?
How much is it to print documents?
What are the charges for printing at the library?
responses: Printing costs $0.10 per page for black and white and $0.50 per page for color.
The price for printing is $0.10 per page for black and white and $0.50 per page for color.
For printing, the fee is $0.10 per page for black and white prints and $0.50 per page for color prints.
